ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... we haven t seen any yet.  we have seen magician armor, enchanter armor, shaman armor (same as pof), paladin and cleric shields, and bard
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "M Sanford (Maev)" <pr0teus@...>
>
> Question to all servers once again? Has *any* imbrued armor
> dropped since the patch on this past
> Wednesday?

we haven't seen any yet. we have seen magician armor, enchanter armor,
shaman armor (same as pof), paladin and cleric shields, and bard
weapons/instrument.

>
> Regarding the Maestro, how far in is he? You said it took 8
> hours. And how hard is he? Does he
> cast any special type of spells?

we had 4 full groups, i think if anything either 0 or 1 person died. he has
an AoE life tap that makes it a long fight, but he is only yellow (not red
like draco) at 50.

>
> Also, when pulling mobs, have you had any weird bugs, where a
> single mob is pulled, and about 3
> minutes into the fight, 5 - 10+ mobs come outta no where and
> wipe out everyone? Even with monks
> feign pulling, and staying feigned while the rest of us
> fought so to keep aggro clear, we still
> get trained everytime.

we had an enchanter in dark-boned skeleton form scouting the areas for our
monk puller. he was not KOS in this form. i don't know if he has killed a
lot in mistmoore or not, but he said he may plan on not killing anything in
PoH in order to be able to do this for all groups he goes up with, and just
be allowed in on lottoes (lottos? hehe). we had very few evacs, if any that
i can remember. with the enchanter scouting and the monk feigning, our
pulls were usually 1 to 3 each time, which were all doable with another
enchanter there messing. though i have heard of very weird pathing
problems, we had relatively good luck. the monk did manage to get maestro
alone, with his guards it may be a very different fight.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L27 High Elf Wizard
Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin
Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
